description: Registry refactor, bug fixes, test coverage, release tooling
changelog:
**New Features:**
- feat(init): support remote spec templates from docs repo
- feat(scripts): create-manifest.js supports beta/rc/release workflows
- feat(scripts): add release:rc script to package.json

**Bug Fixes:**
- fix: template placeholder roundtrip — collectTemplates settings now resolve {{PYTHON_CMD}} correctly
- fix: remove stale cross-platform-thinking-guide.md reference from update command
- fix: tool flags (--claude etc.) now take precedence over -y default
- fix: Windows python3 command compatibility ({{PYTHON_CMD}} placeholder)

**Refactor:**
- refactor: centralized platform registry pattern (replaces scattered init/update logic)
- refactor: extract resolvePlaceholders to shared.ts, remove templates.ts dispatcher
- refactor: simplify tool selection with data-driven approach
- refactor: extract VERSION constant to src/constants/version.ts

**Testing:**
- 333 tests across 19 files (unit, integration, regression)
- @vitest/coverage-v8 with pnpm test:coverage (75.87% line coverage)

**Documentation:**
- docs: add .trellis/spec/unit-test/ conventions (4 files)
- docs: update platform-integration.md with registry pattern, known gaps, CliFlag type
- docs: integrate test guidance into workflow commands (start, check-backend, finish-work)
notes: No migration required. First release candidate — feature complete, stabilization phase.
